mapper.select: select id,path,status,sort,create_time as createTime from t_image order by sort asc,create_time desc
mapper.update: update t_image set sort=#{sort},status=#{status} where id=#{id}
update t_image set sort=sort+1 where sort in (1,2)
update t_image set sort=sort+1 where sort=2
update t_image set sort=10,status=1 where sort=3
